      public int createBlog(BlogModel blog)
      Creates a new blog record in the database.
      Parameters:
      blog - The BlogModel object containing blog details to insert.
      Returns:
      The generated blog ID if insertion is successful; otherwise, -1.

      Returns:

      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException

      Returns:

    • getMostRecentBlogs

      public List<BlogModel> getMostRecentBlogs(int limit, Boolean is_draft)
      Retrieves the most recent blogs filtered by draft status.
      Parameters:
      limit - the maximum number of blogs to return
      is_draft - the draft status filter (true for drafts, false for published)
      Returns:
      a list of BlogModel objects representing the most recent blogs

    • getMostRecentBlogsByAuthor

      public List<BlogModel> getMostRecentBlogsByAuthor(int authorId, int limit, Boolean is_draft)
      Retrieves the most recent blogs by a specific author filtered by draft status.
      Parameters:
      authorId - the author ID
      limit - the maximum number of blogs to return
      is_draft - the draft status filter (true for drafts, false for published)
      Returns:
      a list of BlogModel objects representing the author's most recent blogs
